11.content:
It is a warm Saturday morning, the birds are chriping and doing bird things. You are standing at your desk in default pose waiting for the story to begin. ;) sitting at your desk helplessly browsing your steam library.

*Knock Knock*

You didn't remember ordering anything. Upon opening the door, the hazy memory returns to you. A late-night, drunken purchase made sometime last week. Granted, it wasn't too expensive or anything, but it's always risky ordering anything past the third page of results on Amazon. You certainly didn't even expect anything to arrive this soon (or at all), even in the near-blackout state you were in when ordering.

"Oh yeah...", you laugh to yourself, picking up the small, bubblewrap bag. You return to your room, having already disgarded the packaging material. What was left was looked like a standard, storage flashdrive— no box or any kind of branding to be seen. Better use a virtual OS and scan this for anything sus, you thought to yourself.

You boot into a virtual system, and 15 minutes later... nothing. It's clean. Not a total waste so far, you think. You reboot your system and try using your new device regularly.

You open the files, and you see:
11.title: Tyler (M/20)

111.content:
THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING MEDIAPORT

All functions are means of entering your favorite worlds and interacting with them seamlessly! The provided watch is your comfortable companion to help you activate/control/adjust your experience!

Set-up:

1. Plug in the drive into any USB 2.0/USB 3.0 slot on your device of choice. Drivers will install automatically, then start the MediaPort.exe file located on the drive.

2. Adjust the watch controller to your comfort and power it on by holding button on the top for at least 5 seconds.

3. Link the devices via Bluetooth connection.

INSTRUCTIONS

ENTERING WORLDS:

To enter a world, simply play media on your primary device. A MediaPort icon will appear green in the bottom corner of your player when the software has recognized the media. Then simply, tap the top botton on your watch. You will be directly transported into the world in Ghost Mode by default.

WOLRD INTERACTION:

There are different modes of interaction while inside of Media Port. The default is Ghost Mode.

Nuetral Mode:
You will appear transparent inside your world as a spectator. You cannot interact with the world directly and vise-virsa.

Regular Mode:
You can interact with the world regularly as yourself.

Ghost Mode (Default):
Our newly added Posession Ability! Intetact with the world similar to Neutral Mode until your "etheral" form merges with a character, allowing you to completely control their body as them in the world.

OTHER WATCH CONTROLS:

Reality-Change:
Allows you to change reality inside of the current instance of a world.
Charcter Control:
Allows you to control aspects/decisions/personality of a character in thr current instamce of a world.

(Go back to previous chapter to begin story)
111.title: readme.txt (Device Functions Explained)

112.content: Which form of media do you decide on?
112.title: MediaPort.exe (Begin Story)

112211.content:
You boot up a Mario game and the MediaPort icon blinks to inform a successful sync!

You press the button on the watch and begin to feel strange. You move your hands to your face, but something is off. Your hands are a transparent, blueish hue! You look down and see that you are separated from your body, and your etheral form is being pulled into the watch. It is impossible to fight the force at this point while your vision blurs.

In an instant you see that you are blasting down a wormhole that looks straight out of a Dr. Who episode. You see a colorful light ahead of you, and in an instant, you are ejected from the watch into another plane.

You regain your composure to find yourself in... The Mushroom Kingdom itself! You look down at the watch around your wrist to see that you are still in your etheral form. The watch reads "Ghost Mode". "This is insane.", you think to yourself, when all of a sudden... you see motion in the distance. Who is it?
112211.title: Mario

choices: GM: Try to possess one of them.
NM: Follow them and see where they're going.
1122111.content:
You see Mario walking down the path with Luigi.

What do you do?
1122111.title: Mario and Luigi

choices: NM: Follow her and see where she's going.
1122112.content:
You see Princess Peach walking along the path in the distance on her own.

What do you do?
1122112.title: Peach

11221121.content:
You approach from behind her in your etheral form, a little confused on how to use the ability. It is clear she can't see you or sense your presence at all. A little nervous, you try to tap her in the shoulder, and your finger goes straight through her arm! You see her shiver a bit and look around confused, but it seems she is still unaware of your presence.

Enough messing around you thought, while you begin slipping yourself into her body. You stick your arms into place which feels like putting on tight gloves. Even though Peach is much smaller than you, you feel yourself condensing relative to her shape. She starts to convulse a bit before slipping away. You feel yourself filling in her legs and squeezing into her torso. Finally you feel your head being forcibly pulled into hers, no turning back now. Almost in an instant, you gasp for air feeling very different.

Your breathing felt more constricted and much softer. You see blonde hairs in your face, then you begin to realize the situation. You look down, feeling your new long hair tickle your neck in motion. You see a very feminine princess gown, long hair resting gently on your shoulders. You reach your dainty, gloved hands up your curves, and eventually to the mounds petruding out of your new chest. Shifting your smooth legs together, you could feel the biggest change of all.

"I can't believe it!", you say in your new high-pitch voice. You reach up to your throat, surprised by the voice coming out.

You're Princess Peach! What do you do?
11221121.title: GM: Try to possess her.

choices: Tails working on one of his inventions with Sonic
112212.content:
You boot up a Sonic game and the MediaPort icon blinks to inform a successful sync!

You press the button on the watch and begin to feel strange. You move your hands to your face, but something is off. Your hands are a transparent, blueish hue! You look down and see that you are separated from your body, and your etheral form is being pulled into the watch. It is impossible to fight the force at this point while your vision blurs.

In an instant you see that you are blasting down a wormhole that looks straight out of a Dr. Who episode. You see a colorful light ahead of you, and in an instant, you are ejected from the watch into another plane.

You regain your composure to find yourself in... the world of Sonic! You look down at the watch around your wrist to see that you are still in your etheral form. The watch reads "Ghost Mode". "This is insane.", you think to yourself, when all of a sudden... you hear some commotion in the same room.

Who's there?
112212.title: Sonic

choices: GM: Try to possess one of them.
NM: Watch them and see where they're up to.
1122121.content:
You see tall machines connected with tubes and cables stretching all over this room, and its creator, Tails tinkering with the control panel. Sonic is fetching a tool for him in the other corner.

What do you do?
1122121.title: Tails working on one of his inventions with Sonic

choices: RM: Materilize and talk to her.
NM: Follow her and see what she is up to.
1122122.content:
You see Rouge, oblivious to your presence, planning some sort of devious plot.

What do you do?
1122122.title: Rouge up to no good

112213312.content:
You see the younger sister of Crash, Coco Bandicoot!

What's the plan?
112213312.title: Coco

122.title: MediaPort.exe (Begin Story)

info.brief_description: Possess the characters of your favorite amines, shows, movies, video games, etc!
info.description:
Summary:

Your character (M or F, Age 20), orders a new media accessory that claims to let you "experience your favorite media in a revolutionary and (definetly patented) new way". Story begins on arrival of your new Media Port!

RULES:

1. Stick to formatting: Please use decent english and grammar.

2. LGBTQ subject matter allowed and encouraged.

3. Don't create extremely specific sub-choices AKA writer bait, or your entry will be deleted. If you want something added to the story, either write it yourself or request it.

4. No gross-out fetishes
info.pretty_title: Media Port: A Multimedia Possession Tale
